Class Tree.TreeTask<R>

  • java.lang.Object
    • dove.util.treelib.Tree.TreeTask<R>
  • Enclosing class:
    Tree<T> 

    protected static final class Tree.TreeTask<R>
extends java.lang.Object
    represents a task in this tree

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description

      gives this task high priority

      specifies how this task will be invoked
      static int LOW_PRIORITY
      gives this task low_priority tasks with higher priority will be executed first (tasks get ranked up with their waittime)
      static int NORMAL_PRIORITY
      normal priority

      the Runnable this task should execute
